summary: **Saturday Night Live (SNL)** is a popular American comedy show on NBC. It started in 1975 and has had many famous hosts and musical guests. The show is known for funny sketches that make fun of real-life events and people. Lorne Michaels created it, and many cast members have become famous. SNL has been on for over 50 years and has won lots of awards. It's one of the longest-running TV shows in the U.S. and has been copied in other countries.
title: Saturday Night Live
